name: Digitasport Holdings Limited
description: Developer of a video editor platform designed to promote gaming content. The company's platform provides a game arena, and a medium for content creators to showcase their talent through clip-sharing by offering them easy-to-use video editing and social media distribution tools, enabling content creators to create and edit their content to formats suitable for various social media platforms.
one_liner: Developer of a video editor platform designed to promote gaming content. The company's platform provides a game arena, and a medium for content creators to showcase their talent through clip-sharing by offering them easy-to-use video editing and social media distribution tools, enabling content creators to create and edit their content to formats suitable for various social media platforms.

name: Blue Wire, Inc.
description: Developer of a sports podcasting platform intended to bring together a new generation of creators to create audio content. The company's network is made up of journalists, former athletes, and influential fans, building sports podcasting channels on various sports leagues and college football and soccer markets, enabling users to get updates about the sports.
one_liner: Developer of a sports podcasting platform intended to bring together a new generation of creators to create audio content. The company's network is made up of journalists, former athletes, and influential fans, building sports podcasting channels on various sports leagues and college football and soccer markets, enabling users to get updates about the sports.

name: Conteller Inc.
description: Developer of a digital strategy and content platform designed to help capture content from their own customers. The company's platform offers creative support sessions and a variable payment scheme to creators based on results, visibility, traceability and compliance monitoring in matters of intellectual property and protection of personal data, enabling brands to publish briefs, capture, store and pay for authentic content directly from their clients and non-celebrity creators.
one_liner: Developer of a digital strategy and content platform designed to help capture content from their own customers. The company's platform offers creative support sessions and a variable payment scheme to creators based on results, visibility, traceability and compliance monitoring in matters of intellectual property and protection of personal data, enabling brands to publish briefs, capture, store and pay for authentic content directly from their clients and non-celebrity creators.

name: Detoure Inc
description: Developer of resale marketplace intended to source highly curated clothing from influencers and tastemakers, giving customers access to the most coveted closets in the world at thrift prices. The company helps to create a place to shop second-hand clothes directly from the style icons influencers and to provide a way for influencers to quickly capitalize on their most valuable asset their closet, enabling customers to sell their closet without spending valuable time building and maintaining a shop on other platforms.
one_liner: Developer of resale marketplace intended to source highly curated clothing from influencers and tastemakers, giving customers access to the most coveted closets in the world at thrift prices. The company helps to create a place to shop second-hand clothes directly from the style icons influencers and to provide a way for influencers to quickly capitalize on their most valuable asset their closet, enabling customers to sell their closet without spending valuable time building and maintaining a shop on other platforms.

name: Ejen2u International Sdn Bhd
description: Developer of a reseller ecosystem platform intended to help business owners manage resellers like stockists, agents, and dropships. The company's platform is integrated, digitalized, and data-driven and offers systematic product ordering, detailed reporting, commissions, reward systems, databases, and performance monitoring among others, enabling businesses to improve productivity and profitability.
one_liner: Developer of a reseller ecosystem platform intended to help business owners manage resellers like stockists, agents, and dropships. The company's platform is integrated, digitalized, and data-driven and offers systematic product ordering, detailed reporting, commissions, reward systems, databases, and performance monitoring among others, enabling businesses to improve productivity and profitability.

name: Gnowbe Group Ltd
description: Developer of a mobile micro-learning educational software designed to offer employee development, training, and engagement tool. The company's system features group boards for shared learning and, scheduled session deployment, rapid curation accessing multimedia options, gamification, offline access, and push notifications, enabling creators to improve culture, and capabilities by designing engaging, informative, fun content.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile micro-learning educational software designed to offer employee development, training, and engagement tool. The company's system features group boards for shared learning and, scheduled session deployment, rapid curation accessing multimedia options, gamification, offline access, and push notifications, enabling creators to improve culture, and capabilities by designing engaging, informative, fun content.

name: HopShop Inc.
description: HopShop turns fashion creators' Instagram posts into shoppable storefronts with AI-powered product matching and tagging.
one_liner: HopShop turns fashion creators' Instagram posts into shoppable storefronts with AI-powered product matching and tagging.

name: Refractor, Inc
description: Developer of a co-ownership protocol and social trading platform designed to create, share, discover, and execute diverse trade ideas. The company's platform provides a social trading application that makes financial influencers manage portfolios with friends, offers trading strategies, and lets users get paid directly by their fans, enabling groups to create and manage a shared vault where they can pool funds, co-purchase digital assets, and use web3 together in a safe, transparent unified experience.
one_liner: Developer of a co-ownership protocol and social trading platform designed to create, share, discover, and execute diverse trade ideas. The company's platform provides a social trading application that makes financial influencers manage portfolios with friends, offers trading strategies, and lets users get paid directly by their fans, enabling groups to create and manage a shared vault where they can pool funds, co-purchase digital assets, and use web3 together in a safe, transparent unified experience.

name: Melodics Ltd.
description: Developer of a desktop application designed to help people to play their musical instruments with confidence. The company's application offers music lessons that build a rhythm, timing, and muscle memory to develop an understanding of the patterns, theory, and structure of contemporary music through active learning and performance, enabling music enthusiasts to improve musical skills by making practice fun, relevant, and effective.
one_liner: Developer of a desktop application designed to help people to play their musical instruments with confidence. The company's application offers music lessons that build a rhythm, timing, and muscle memory to develop an understanding of the patterns, theory, and structure of contemporary music through active learning and performance, enabling music enthusiasts to improve musical skills by making practice fun, relevant, and effective.

name: Scouter LLC
description: Operator of an online property rental platform intended to provide vacation properties. The company's platform offers properties for various events such as workshops, parties, shooting, etc, and also allows owners to rent out their property via its platform, enabling users to book properties according to their requirements.
one_liner: Operator of an online property rental platform intended to provide vacation properties. The company's platform offers properties for various events such as workshops, parties, shooting, etc, and also allows owners to rent out their property via its platform, enabling users to book properties according to their requirements.
industry: Entertainment / Media, Creator Economy, B2B Marketplaces

name: Tales, Inc.
description: Developer of a content publishing platform through generative artificial intelligence tools, new storytelling formats, and ownership models, designed to offer budding writers a space to showcase their creative skills. The company's platform lets creators make books, comics, games, audiobooks, and everything in between, enabling content creators to rapidly pilot episodic stories and iterate off feedback or metrics to improve performance.
one_liner: Developer of a content publishing platform through generative artificial intelligence tools, new storytelling formats, and ownership models, designed to offer budding writers a space to showcase their creative skills. The company's platform lets creators make books, comics, games, audiobooks, and everything in between, enabling content creators to rapidly pilot episodic stories and iterate off feedback or metrics to improve performance.

name: Thematic Inc.
description: Developer of a music licensing platform designed to empower music artists and content creators. The company's platform matches content creators on digital platforms with established and aspiring musicians, enabling artists to feature their music in online videos without the worry of copyright infringement.
one_liner: Developer of a music licensing platform designed to empower music artists and content creators. The company's platform matches content creators on digital platforms with established and aspiring musicians, enabling artists to feature their music in online videos without the worry of copyright infringement.
